body_html:
Note in tensorflow 1.8.0.rc1 the functional API appears to be working:

import tensorflow as tf

inputs = tf.keras.layers.Input(shape=(784,))
outputs = tf.keras.layers.Dense(10)(inputs)
model = tf.keras.models.Model(inputs=inputs, outputs=outputs)

tf.keras.utils.plot_model(model, "functional.png")

in tensorflow 1.7.0 the functional API has the same error as the Sequential API.

in tensorflow 1.7.0 the functional API has the same error as the Sequential API.
body:
Note in tensorflow 1.8.0.rc1 the functional API appears to be working:

```
import tensorflow as tf

inputs = tf.keras.layers.Input(shape=(784,))
outputs = tf.keras.layers.Dense(10)(inputs)
model = tf.keras.models.Model(inputs=inputs, outputs=outputs)

tf.keras.utils.plot_model(model, "functional.png")
```

in tensorflow 1.7.0 the functional API has the same error as the Sequential API.
